sentences.en: A grim and unsightly picture met his eye.
sentences.cn: 一幅可怕和难看的情景映入他的眼帘.

sentences.en: Failing to do so would cause unsightly burn marks.
sentences.cn: 如果不这样做便会产生难看的烤糊痕迹!

sentences.en: Her room was an unsightly mess.
sentences.cn: 她的房间乱成一团,很不雅观.

sentences.en: His skin was covered with unsightly blotches.
sentences.cn: 他的皮肤上长满了难看的疹块.

sentences.en: How unsightly! The bride is wolfing down her meal.
sentences.cn: 多么难看! 新娘在狼吞虎咽!

sentences.en: Image Doctor renders seamless removals of unsightly blemishes and objects.
sentences.cn: 医生形象使无缝清除有碍观瞻污点和对象.

sentences.en: Join Humanity in the 21 st century and rid your vanity of unsightly fur!
sentences.cn: 加入到21世纪的人群中来,丢掉穿戴难看皮草的虚荣心吧!

sentences.en: My mother has had unsightly varicose veins for years.
sentences.cn: 我母亲多年来一直患有难看的静脉曲张。

sentences.en: The house is a mere unsightly excrescence in the landscape.
sentences.cn: 这间房子是这风景画中难看的累赘.

sentences.en: The marking on the wall was childish and unsightly.
sentences.cn: 墙上的记号幼稚而难看.

sentences.en: The marking the wall was childish and unsightly.
sentences.cn: 墙上的记号幼稚而且难看.

sentences.en: The Polish market in Berlin was considered unsightly and shut down.
sentences.cn: 柏林市内的波兰市场因为被认为有碍观瞻而关闭了。

sentences.en: To begin with, the club itself is very unsightly.
sentences.cn: 首先, 这家夜总会本身就很不堪入目.

sentences.en: Unsightly contour was improved by removing more bone from crest posteriorly.
sentences.cn: 从髂嵴后方切除多余骨质后难看的外形得以改善.

sentences.en: Unsightly moles can be removed surgically.
sentences.cn: 不雅观的痣可以手术去除.

trans.tran_cn: 不美观的，难看的，不好看的
trans.tran_en: ugly or unpleasant to look at
